text: Live December 2004 A Souvenir of Camber Sands is a live album by Throbbing Gristle released on the night of the performance. The performance and CD are both dedicated to John Balance who died in November 2004. The CD-R set was on sale minutes after Throbbing Gristle finished performing. Leftovers were available from Mute Records. The CD 1/CD 2 split differs on some of the CD-Rs. ==Track listing== CD 1: Part One #P-A D/What a Day/Greasy Spoon/Live- Ray/Hamburger Lady/Almost Like This - 55:33 *All songs appear on a single track. CD 2: Part Two #poem/Splitting Sky/Convincing People/Fed Up/Wall of Sound - 36:08 *All songs appear on a single track. Category:2004 live albums Category:Throbbing Gristle live albums Category:Mute Records live albums
title: Live December 2004 A Souvenir of Camber Sands
